title: Add recommendation exposure logging (impression/click/apply) with stable IDs

sections.text: Instrument Sales_Accelerator to emit structured analytics events whenever a recommendation is shown, clicked, or applied by a rep. Include stable identifiers (recommendation_id, model_version, account/opportunity_id, user_id, timestamp, surface) so downstream analysis can distinguish exposure from outcomes. Persist events to the existing analytics pipeline/data store and validate payload completeness in staging.
